txt.en: 'I cannot believe it....\n\n'You have saved us, [placeholder]! We have not had a proper meal in days now. I had not thought that there was any hope left for us.'
This crop has been ruined by the frost
This crop is still good to eat
The villagers fear that all the crops they harvested have been spoiled by the frost.

'You are not afraid to go back and search for the crops?

'You are incredibly brave, stranger. I do not think you will find any food fit to eat, but you have my thanks for trying.

'Please be careful. It is not worth it to die an unnatural death for the sake of frost-bitten food.'
Harvested crops can be found throughout Dunfast near many of the buildings.\n\nYou should check the crops for spoilage, and gather any that are still safe to eat.
'I cannot believe it....\n\n'You have saved us, [placeholder]! We have not had a proper meal in days now. I had not thought that there was any hope left for us.'
Gifemund can be found at the refugees' encampment south-west of Dunfast.\n\nYou should bring the crops you rescued to Gifemund.
Bring the crops you salvaged to Gifemund
